title: Chromophobia
creator_credit: Raoul Servais and Ministry of National Education and Culture (Brussels)
brief_description: Uses whimsical animation and music to present the dilemma of a society caught in a militaristic dictatorship, and to show the eventual victory of its free spirit. A completely standardised army attempts to impose its rule on
